message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with machine learning and specifically with convolutional neural networks, which are commonly used in computer vision tasks. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is a very likely sub-category. The paper also addresses the issue of catastrophic forgetting, which is a common problem in lifelong learning, so cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely sub-category. The paper proposes a method to overcome catastrophic forgetting, which involves augmenting the network selectively, so cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is another possible sub-category. The paper also uses neural networks, which are a type of computational model used in machine learning, so cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is another possible sub-category. Finally, the paper deals with natural language processing tasks, which are often addressed in the sub-category cs.CL (Computation and Language).
